sourcesContent:
Esta es la Fotos Page

Contenido de la Fotos Page

import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {Foto} from "../../models/foto.model"; @Component({ selector: 'app-fotos-page', templateUrl: './fotos-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fotos-page.component.css'] }) export class FotosPageComponent { images: Foto[] = [ {img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 1'}, {img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 2'}, {img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 3'}, {img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 4'}, {img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 5'} ]; verImagen(image: Foto): void { } }
